verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
O come all ye faithful,
Joyful and triumphant,

verse.name: v1b
c1a
verse.lines:
O come, let us adore Him,
O come, let us adore Him,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
O come, let us adore Him,
Christ the Lord.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
God of God,
Light of light,

verse.name: v2b
v3a
verse.lines:
Sing, choirs of angels,
Sing in exultation,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Sing all ye citizens of heaven above:
Glory to God
In the highest:

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
Word of the Father,
Now in flesh appearing:
